org.trellisldp.webac

Class WebACService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trellisldp.webac.WebACService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccessControlService

    public class WebACService
extends Object
implements AccessControlService
    An AccessControlService implementation, based on the rules defined by WebAC.
    See Also:
    SOLID Web Access Control
